name: Super Factory-Tycoon Game
description:
Super Factory is a game in which you build and manage funniest factories.

In the beginning you will craft mechanical arm, build production line of foods, transport products to customers, promote advertisement and research for the better taste and efficiency.

Features:
-Perfect simulation of factory production line, even including the details of falling, crushing, cutting and so on.
-Control electric power, financial resources, transport capacity, new technology research and more than 10 departments.
- As a boss, you need to recruit employees, recruit the elites, train them to grow, and protect their welfare! - Idle and strateg gameplay for every player.
- Constant challenges of employees and incremental workshop and profit.
- Dozens of types of strategies to be controlled.
- Different types of production lines and machines in every factory.
- Numerous foods and gameplay to be unlocked.
- Management of a small world in miniature.
